title: Formula 1 announces calendar for 2024|url=https://www.formula1.com/en/latest/article.formula-1-announces-calendar-for-2024.XL3c5Cxi0ZOQzPrUu5izL.html|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230310215243/https://www.formula1.com/en/latest/article.formula-1-update-on-the-2023-calendar.4pTQzihtKTiegogmNX5XrP.html|archive-date=2023-07-05|access-date=2024-01-21|website=Formula1.com|dead-url=no}}</ref>車手及車隊将分別爭奪[[一級方程式世界車手冠軍列表|車手世界冠軍]]和[[一级方程式世界车队冠军列表|車隊世界冠軍]]的頭銜，[[馬克斯·維斯塔潘|马克斯·维斯塔潘]]於[[2024年拉斯维加斯大奖赛|拉斯维加斯大奖赛]]提前兩站贏得车手总冠军，[[迈凯轮车队]]则在最後一站[[2024年阿布達比大奖赛|阿布達比大奖赛]]时隔26年获得第九座车队总冠军。<ref>{{cite web|date=2023-10-07|title=Verstappen secures third F1 world title as Piastri takes Sprint victory in Qatar|url=https://www.formula1.com/en/latest/article.verstappen-secures-third-f1-world-title-as-piastri-takes-sprint-victory-in.4d0SLopnXU9W8uzefnJmu3.html|access-date=2023-10-07|website=Formula1.com|archive-date=2023-10-11|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20231011012612/https://www.formula1.com/en/latest/article.verstappen-secures-third-f1-world-title-as-piastri-takes-sprint-victory-in.4d0SLopnXU9W8uzefnJmu3.html|dead-url=no}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|date=2023-09-24|title=Verstappen dominates for Japanese GP victory as Red Bull secure back-to-back constructors' titles|url=https://www.formula1.com/en/latest/article.verstappen-dominates-for-japanese-gp-victory-as-red-bull-secure-back-to-back.6nJ1rDkiGByJw6nypqVPO6.html|access-date=2023-09-24|website=Formula1.com|archive-date=2023-10-05|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20231005152652/https://www.formula1.com/en/latest/article.verstappen-dominates-for-japanese-gp-victory-as-red-bull-secure-back-to-back.6nJ1rDkiGByJw6nypqVPO6.html|dead-url=no}}</ref>
